alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 3:54PM EDT until July 19 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Several properties surrounded by floodwaters along Riverside Park Drive and Bachelder Road with damages likely to items not moved to higher ground. Water up to properties on Jasper Drive in Allenstown. Floodwaters encroach onto low lying properties of Kings Town Park in Epsom. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM EDT Sunday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
